DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate different treatment regimen order able develop new indication optimize result already obtain treatment wrinkle around eye . We therefore propose perform safety clinical trial male female volunteer different schedule per day per week . A total 100 subject ( male female ) randomize study accord follow schedule exposure : Group A : 20 subject ( 8 male - 12 female ) expose LED twice week one cycle ( 35 second ) interval treatment least 2 day , treatment period 4 week . Group B : 20 subject ( 8 male - 12 female ) expose LED twice week two consecutive cycle ( 35 second ) interval treatment least 2 day , treatment period 4 week . Group C : 20 subject ( 8 male - 12 female ) expose LED one cycle ( 35 second ) twice day ( morning evening ) . This treatment repeat twice week interval treatment least 2 day , treatment period 4 week . Group D : 20 subject ( 8 male - 12 female ) expose LED one cycle ( 35 second ) every day ( Monday Friday ) treatment period 4 week . Group E : 20 subject ( 8 male - 12 female ) expose LED two consecutive cycle ( 35 second ) every day ( Monday Friday ) treatment period 4 week . treatment period 4 week .
